title: Forget All (request)
description: Immediately cancel the real-time streams of messages of given type.

forget_all.description: Cancel all streams by type (it can be a single string e.g. 'ticks', or an array of multiple values, e.g. ['ticks', 'candles']). Possible values are: 'ticks', 'candles', 'proposal', 'proposal_open_contract', 'balance', 'transaction', 'proposal_array', 'website_status'.

passthrough.description: [Optional] Used to pass data through the websocket, which may be retrieved via the `echo_req` output field.

req_id.description: [Optional] Used to map request to response.
